00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.ReorganizeTableStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00009 import liquibase.database.structure.ForeignKey;
00010 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00011 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00012 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00013 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00014 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00015 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00016 
00017 import java.util.*;
00018 
00023 public class AddLookupTableChange extends AbstractChange {
00024 
00025     private String existingTableSchemaName;
00026     private String existingTableName;
00027     private String existingColumnName;
00028 
00029     private String newTableSchemaName;
00030     private String newTableName;
00031     private String newColumnName;
00032     private String newColumnDataType;
00033     private String constraintName;
00034 
00035     public AddLookupTableChange() {
00036         super("addLookupTable", "Add Lookup Table");
00037     }
00038 
00039     public String getExistingTableSchemaName() {
00040         return existingTableSchemaName;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public void setExistingTableSchemaName(String existingTableSchemaName) {
00044         this.existingTableSchemaName = existingTableSchemaName;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public String getExistingTableName() {
00048         return existingTableName;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public void setExistingTableName(String existingTableName) {
00052         this.existingTableName = existingTableName;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public String getExistingColumnName() {
00056         return existingColumnName;
00057     }
00058 
00059     public void setExistingColumnName(String existingColumnName) {
00060         this.existingColumnName = existingColumnName;
00061     }
00062 
00063 
00064     public String getNewTableSchemaName() {
00065         return newTableSchemaName;
00066     }
00067 
00068     public void setNewTableSchemaName(String newTableSchemaName) {
00069         this.newTableSchemaName = newTableSchemaName;
00070     }
00071 
00072     public String getNewTableName() {
00073         return newTableName;
00074     }
00075 
00076     public void setNewTableName(String newTableName) {
00077         this.newTableName = newTableName;
00078     }
00079 
00080     public String getNewColumnName() {
00081         return newColumnName;
00082     }

00084     public void setNewColumnName(String newColumnName) {
00085         this.newColumnName = newColumnName;
00086     }

00089         return newColumnDataType;
00090     }

00092     public void setNewColumnDataType(String newColumnDataType) {
00093         this.newColumnDataType = newColumnDataType;
00094     }

00096     public String getConstraintName() {
00097         return constraintName;
00098     }
00099 
00100     public String getFinalConstraintName() {
00101         if (constraintName == null) {
00102             return ("FK_" + getExistingTableName() + "_" + getNewTableName()).toUpperCase();
00103         } else {
00104             return constraintName;
00105         }
00106     }
00107 
00108     public void setConstraintName(String constraintName) {
00109         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00110     }
00111 
00112     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00113         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(existingTableName) == null) {
00114             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("existingTableName is required", this);
00115         }
00116         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(existingColumnName) == null) {
00117             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("existingColumnName is required", this);
00118         }
00119         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(newTableName) == null) {
00120             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("newTableName is required", this);
00121         }
00122         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(newColumnName) == null) {
00123             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("newColumnName is required", this);
00124         }
00125     }
00126 
00127     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00128         DropForeignKeyConstraintChange dropFK = new DropForeignKeyConstraintChange();
00129         dropFK.setBaseTableSchemaName(getExistingTableSchemaName());
00130         dropFK.setBaseTableName(getExistingTableName());
00131         dropFK.setConstraintName(getFinalConstraintName());
00132 
00133         DropTableChange dropTable = new DropTableChange();
00134         dropTable.setSchemaName(getNewTableSchemaName());
00135         dropTable.setTableName(getNewTableName());
00136 
00137         return new Change[]{
00138                 dropFK,
00139                 dropTable,
00140         };
00141     }
00142 
00143     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00144         if (database instanceof DerbyDatabase) {
00145             throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Add Lookup Table currently not supported in Derby");
00146         } else if (database instanceof HsqlDatabase) {
00147             throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Add Lookup Table currently not supported in HSQLDB");
00148         } else if (database instanceof CacheDatabase) {
00149             throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Add Lookup Table not currently supported for Cache");
00150         } else if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase) {
00151             throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Add Lookup Table not currently supported for Firebird");
00152         }
00153 
00154         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00155 
00156         String newTableSchemaName = getNewTableSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getNewTableSchemaName();
00157         String existingTableSchemaName = getExistingTableSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getExistingTableSchemaName();
00158 
00159         SqlStatement[] createTablesSQL = {new RawSqlStatement("CREATE TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(newTableSchemaName, getNewTableName()) + " AS SELECT DISTINCT " + getExistingColumnName() + " AS " + getNewColumnName() + " FROM " + database.escapeTableName(existingTableSchemaName, getExistingTableName()) + " WHERE " + getExistingColumnName() + " IS NOT NULL")};
00160         if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00161             createTablesSQL = new SqlStatement[]{new RawSqlStatement("SELECT DISTINCT " + getExistingColumnName() + " AS " + getNewColumnName() + " INTO " + database.escapeTableName(newTableSchemaName, getNewTableName()) + " FROM " + database.escapeTableName(existingTableSchemaName, getExistingTableName()) + " WHERE " + getExistingColumnName() + " IS NOT NULL"),};
00162         } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00163             createTablesSQL = new SqlStatement[]{
00164                     new RawSqlStatement("CREATE TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(newTableSchemaName, getNewTableName()) + " AS (SELECT " + getExistingColumnName() + " AS " + getNewColumnName() + " FROM " + database.escapeTableName(existingTableSchemaName, getExistingTableName()) + ") WITH NO DATA"),
00165                     new RawSqlStatement("INSERT INTO " + database.escapeTableName(newTableSchemaName, getNewTableName()) + " SELECT DISTINCT " + getExistingColumnName() + " FROM " + database.escapeTableName(existingTableSchemaName, getExistingTableName()) + " WHERE " + getExistingColumnName() + " IS NOT NULL"),
00166             };
00167         }
00168 
00169         statements.addAll(Arrays.asList(createTablesSQL));
00170 
00171         if (!(database instanceof OracleDatabase)) {
00172             AddNotNullConstraintChange addNotNullChange = new AddNotNullConstraintChange();
00173             addNotNullChange.setSchemaName(newTableSchemaName);
00174             addNotNullChange.setTableName(getNewTableName());
00175             addNotNullChange.setColumnName(getNewColumnName());
00176             addNotNullChange.setColumnDataType(getNewColumnDataType());
00177             statements.addAll(Arrays.asList(addNotNullChange.generateStatements(database)));
00178         }
00179 
00180         if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00181             statements.add(new ReorganizeTableStatement(newTableSchemaName, getNewTableName()));
00182         }
00183 
00184         AddPrimaryKeyChange addPKChange = new AddPrimaryKeyChange();
00185         addPKChange.setSchemaName(newTableSchemaName);
00186         addPKChange.setTableName(getNewTableName());
00187         addPKChange.setColumnNames(getNewColumnName());
00188         statements.addAll(Arrays.asList(addPKChange.generateStatements(database)));
00189 
00190         if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00191             statements.add(new ReorganizeTableStatement(newTableSchemaName, getNewTableName()));
00192         }
00193 
00194         AddForeignKeyConstraintChange addFKChange = new AddForeignKeyConstraintChange();
00195         addFKChange.setBaseTableSchemaName(existingTableSchemaName);
00196         addFKChange.setBaseTableName(getExistingTableName());
00197         addFKChange.setBaseColumnNames(getExistingColumnName());
00198         addFKChange.setReferencedTableSchemaName(newTableSchemaName);
00199         addFKChange.setReferencedTableName(getNewTableName());
00200         addFKChange.setReferencedColumnNames(getNewColumnName());
00201 
00202         addFKChange.setConstraintName(getFinalConstraintName());
00203         statements.addAll(Arrays.asList(addFKChange.generateStatements(database)));
00204 
00205         return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);
00206     }
00207 
00208     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00209         return "Lookup table added for "+getExistingTableName()+"."+getExistingColumnName();
00210     }
00211 
00212     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00213         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00214         if (getExistingTableSchemaName() != null) {
00215             node.setAttribute("newTableSchemaName", getExistingTableSchemaName());
00216         }
00217         node.setAttribute("existingTableName", getExistingTableName());
00218         node.setAttribute("existingColumnName", getExistingColumnName());
00219 
00220         if (getNewTableSchemaName() != null) {
00221             node.setAttribute("newTableSchemaName", getNewTableSchemaName());
00222         }
00223 
00224         node.setAttribute("newTableName", getNewTableName());
00225         node.setAttribute("newColumnName", getNewColumnName());
00226         node.setAttribute("constraintName", getConstraintName());
00227 
00228         return node;
00229     }
00230 
00231     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00232         Set<DatabaseObject> returnSet = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00233 
00234         Table existingTable = new Table(getExistingTableName());
00235         returnSet.add(existingTable);
00236 
00237         Column existingColumn = new Column();
00238         existingColumn.setTable(existingTable);
00239         existingColumn.setName(getExistingColumnName());
00240         returnSet.add(existingColumn);
00241 
00242         Table newTable = new Table(getNewTableName());
00243         returnSet.add(newTable);
00244 
00245         Column newColumn = new Column();
00246         newColumn.setTable(existingTable);
00247         newColumn.setName(getNewColumnName());
00248         returnSet.add(newColumn);
00249 
00250         ForeignKey fk = new ForeignKey();
00251         fk.setForeignKeyTable(existingTable);
00252         fk.setForeignKeyColumns(existingColumn.getName());
00253         fk.setPrimaryKeyTable(newTable);
00254         fk.setPrimaryKeyColumns(newColumn.getName());
00255         returnSet.add(fk);
00256 
00257         return returnSet;
00258 
00259     }
00260 }
